thread.title: Very clean, quiet hotel, but no food services at the present time
thread.title_full: Very clean, quiet hotel, but no food services at the present time - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Brian C
title: Very clean, quiet hotel, but no food services at the present time
text: The Hilton Garden Inn Times Square is a very conveniently located hotel to Times Square and the Theater District with many restaurants close by. The hotel is clean, comfortable and quiet. There is no real lobby to speak of, but mostly you don't stay in a NYC hotel for the lobby. Overall the hotel is a very good choice, reasonably priced and comfortable.
